dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into manageable parts and analyze them systematically.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their problem-solving approach, often thinking outside the box.

dimensions.label: Learning Preference
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids such as images, diagrams, and videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through listening to explanations, lectures, or discussions.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront and assert themselves to resolve conflicts, often taking a strong stance.
Your FarTwin will work with others to find mutually beneficial solutions, prioritizing harmony over competition.

dimensions.label: Technology Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How comfortable is your FarTwin with using technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly skilled and confident in their ability to use technology, leveraging it to their advantage.
Your FarTwin will have some basic knowledge of technology, but may feel uncomfortable or uncertain when faced with complex tasks.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express themselves through visual art, music, or other creative outlets.
Your FarTwin will express themselves through words, writing stories, poetry, or engaging in debates.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize tasks and strive for efficiency, often setting high standards for themselves.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances and prioritize flexibility over strict adherence to schedules.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their emotions, seeking support from others when needed.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with trusted individuals or through subtle cues.
